actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide State and local governments greater flexibility and self-determination in addressing how specific highway needs can best be met.

summary.text: Removes restrictions on State transfers of certain apportioned highway funds. Requires States to utilize a specified percentage of such funds on the projects for which they were apportioned, except where the State certifies to the Secretary of Transportation that such percentage is in excess of existing highway needs. Amends the Surface Transportation Assistance Act of 1982 to conform to provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide State and local governments greater flexibility and self-determination in addressing how specific highway needs can best be met.
